    • selectedCountry

      public void selectedCountry(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws SQLException
      Retrieves the selected country from a customer country combo box and updates the options of a customer region combo box based on the selected country. Lambda Uses a lambda expression to iterate over the allFirstLevelDivisions list and conditionally add items to three other lists based on the countryID property of each FirstLevelDivision object.
      Parameters:
      event - When the countryCombo box is set
      Throws:
      SQLException - when an error occurs while attempting to access the database.
